text: The 1920 Big Ten Conference Men's Golf Championship was held October 22–23, 1920 at the Olympia Fields Country Club in Olympia Fields, Illinois. The team champion was Drake with a match play score of 28 down. ==Team results== *72 holes of match play was used to determine the team champion. {| class=wikitable !Place !! Team !! Score |- | align=center|1 || Drake || 28 down |- | align=center|2 || Chicago || 37 down |- | align=center rowspan=2|T3 || Ohio State || rowspan=2|70 down |- | Illinois |- | align=center|5 || Michigan || 73 down |- | align=center|6 || Northwestern || 81 down |- | align=center|7 || Wisconsin || 85 down |} ==References== Category:Big Ten Conference men's golf Big Ten Conference Men's Golf Championship
title: 1920 Big Ten Conference Men's Golf Championship
